creator: MTN GHANA
descriptionHtml:
Get informed about Ghanaian heritage covering culture, history, tradition and more. Learn and check how you measure up in your awareness about information on your roots compared with your peers by way of the Heritage Quiz.
Form heritage communities and personal communications. Learn and entertain yourself at the same time.
descriptionShort: Cultural, Historical, Traditional and other Heritage info with social community
